body.name: novzzovaz Digital Camera 4K 48MP Camera for Photography with Flip Screen Autofocus Vlogging Camera for YouTube with Selfie Light, Mini Tripod Accessories, Two Batteries
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
features: [ 48MP & 4K HD Digital Camera ] This V-Cam vlogging camera adopted SONY sensor, shooting clear photos up to 48 megapixels and video resolution up to 4K. Supporting 16X Digital Zoom. Besides, it is autofocus, tracking object automaticlly to capture clear photos, for close-up shoting, you can also half pressing the shutter for fast focusing.

[ Flip Screen & Pop-up Flashlight ] This vlog camera has a 3'' flip screen that can be rotated 180 degrees to meet your shooting needs in different poses and realize low-camera shooting, making selfie shooting easier and more fun. And its retractable flashlight system providing the best solution in dim light conditions. When your vision is limited in a dark environment, you can pop up the flash to get a brighter view.

[ Webcam for Live Streaming ] The small camera can be used as webcam by selecting the "PC Camera" mode after connected to your PC via the USB cable, you can have video calls or start live streaming to share things on social media. So its not only a photo camera for photography but also a streaming camera and video camera for Youtube, Instagram, etc.

[ Multifunctions Photography Camera ] The video camera has multiple functions. Such as Continuous Shooting, self-timer, flash for taking photos, and time-lapse, slow-motion, looping video for video shooting. Besides, we upgrade the camera to add built-in Macro Mode, so you don't need to add extra Macro Lens. When you display something up to the camera for a close-up, just click the Macro button then the focus repositions.

[ Rich Accessories ] The vlog camera contains two rechargeable batteries, mini tripod, selfie light(light AAA battery not included), USB cable, strap etc., making photography more fun. The camera supports up to 128GB MicroSD card (not included), so there is no need to worry about insufficient memory.

[ Perfect Gift for Beginners ] The pocket camera has an exquisite looking, is perfect gift for entry-level users who just start in content creation. It is the very affordable vlog camera for creators, vloggers and streamers. Recording travel, sports events, weddings, birthday parties and other activities will be so easy with its help, is an ideal gift for friends, teens and families. If you have any question about the product, please feel free to contact us and we will reply you within 24 hours.

What type of memory card do I need? There are two size memory cards, the larger one named SD card, the small size named MicroSD card or TF Card, this camera takes MicroSD card, supporting from 32GB to 128GB. Recommend to use wellknown brand high speed MicroSD card. How would I transfer videos from the camera to another device like my phone or laptop? Connect the camera to your laptop with the USB cable, select 'Mass storage mode', then you can transfer the photo and videos files, or you can buy a MicroSD card reader with multi-interface which compatible with both laptop and your smartphone. What is the recording time? The recording time is about 30-60min per battery according to the camera usage. Can I apply other lenses? Yes. This camera can be matched with 52mm lens, you can apply various lenses or filters to make photography more fun. How to insert the card and battery? Push the MicroSD card into the card slot in the correct direction until you hear a click sound, means the card installed. If want to remove the card, just push again the card to the end until you hear a click sound, the card will pop out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This digital camera takes excellent photos that are clear and crisp. It has many settings/modes to find the right look for the perfect picture without using external software for editing/color correction, and it is simple to use. It feels solid (it has some weight) and comes with several accessories, including a selfie light, two batteries (handy), a mini tripod, a strap, and a USB cable. It also includes a flip screen for selfies, making the perfect shot easily achievable (a feature that one can utilize for live streaming - which I have not used). The digital zoom is impressive, the LCD screen is large enough to be more than sufficient when taking pictures and reviewing them, and the autofocus is easy to engage (and it works well).The menu is easy to navigate. Now that I have found a suitable standalone digital camera to take photos, I will use it quite a bit for projects as it is a more than capable replacement for my cell phone (actually, this surpasses it). For the professional photographer or simply someone who knows their way around a camera, you might not be as captivated as I am. But this camera exceeds expectations for someone looking to point and shoot and is an excellent alternative to your expensive phone. I am thoroughly impressed.(And I predict that you will be, too)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money.
reviews.reviewText: Not even close to 4K. Images are insanely pixelated, colors are very distorted. I added side by side pictures from my iPhone camera to this camera. It’s actually embarrassing how bad this camera quality is. Even with a bottle a few inches from the camera, the letters are pixelated and unclear, nothing is crisp, my face is pixelated and it makes my skin seem lighter and hair seem darker. Will return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Camera is really only 2.1MP, firmware upscales images to look like they're higher resolution
reviews.reviewText: I've seen several cameras using this firmware, and like all the rest this camera uses a cheap, 2.1MP webcam module and upscales the native resolution to whatever inflated number the manufacture wants to claim. This can be confirmed when you plug it into a computer in webcam mode and open the camera app, where it'll show you the real capabilities as it's your computer rather then the dodgy firmware reporting.While I have to say it has a nice assortment of accessories, and the flip up screen is a nice feature, I can't recommend it as the capabilities are deliberately and intentionally being misrepresented, and absolutely not at the outrageous $130 price tag they're currently asking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You almost get what you pay for - No SD card included when the manual states that it is.
reviews.reviewText: I had viewed this item's description many times and after receiving it, I viewed several videos as to how to properly set up and use. It was then that I did not receive the memory care that the manual states is included and unfortunately this is simply a cheap camera. There are no editing functions and no bluetooth / Wifi. I had not anticipated the additional expense of the memory card nor did I think that the actual button for use to be confusing. When I assembled the whole unit with the stand I felt as though it wasn't super stable and that the camera would survive one drop. I would only recommend this for beginners who mainly want to use it for vlogging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Starter Camera for Vlogging
reviews.reviewText: The V-Cam vlogging camera offers compelling reasons to consider it over using a modern smartphone:1. **High Resolution and Autofocus**: With a 48MP sensor and 4K video resolution, this camera captures detailed photos and videos. Its autofocus and object tracking ensure clear shots, even for close-ups. Not all smartphones have 4K and a 48MP sensor. Translation: better video quality.2. **Flip Screen and Flashlight**: The 3'' flip screen allows flexible shooting angles, making selfie shots more fun. The pop-up flashlight provides better visibility in low-light conditions. Not all smartphones have that capacity.3. **Webcam Functionality**: It doubles as a webcam for live streaming, making it versatile for video calls and social media content creation.4. **Multiple Photography Functions**: The camera offers features like continuous shooting, self-timer, time-lapse, and slow motion, catering to various shooting needs. It even has a built-in Macro Mode for close-up shots. Not all smartphones have those features.5. **Rich Accessories**: It comes with rechargeable batteries, a mini tripod, a selfie light, USB cable, strap, and supports up to 128GB MicroSD cards. The included accessories enhance your photography experience. Again, smartphones lack such features.6. **Ideal for Beginners**: This camera is a great entry-level option for content creators, vloggers, and streamers. It's affordable and user-friendly, suitable for various activities like travel, events, and parties. Prep yourself for an upgrade!In summary, the V-Cam vlogging camera offers advanced features, including high resolution, webcam capabilities, and multiple shooting modes, making it a valuable choice for those seeking to elevate their photography and content creation beyond what a smartphone can offer.At $130, it's a good gift for a teenager or budding vlogger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots Of Features At An Affordable Price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am thinking about VLOGs, and so I obtained the Digital Camera 4K 48MP. Phone cameras are kind of all over the place with apps and focusing issues and automatic off and too sensitive screen and buttons and flat shape and no 1/4" camera mount and on and on. Like the previous sentence in this review, phone cameras are just kind of jumpy. I have had a couple of name brand digital cameras in the past. Little plastic tabs on the battery compartment break, and then you end up holding the battery door closed with tape or a rubber band. So it was time for a new high MP 4K camera. The front pointing screen option is a huge plus. I look forward to learning to use the Digital Camera 4K 48MP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure what happened but my camera has a glare in it and it shows on all my picture I’m so crushed
